Notes.Text:
This update for icu fixes the following issue:

The previous patch for CVE-2014-9654 was incorrect and lead
to non-working regular expressions. This update fixes this 
problem (bsc#952260)

Vulnerabilities.Description: The Regular Expressions package in International Components for Unicode (ICU) for C/C++ before 2014-12-03, as used in Google Chrome before 40.0.2214.91, calculates certain values without ensuring that they can be represented in a 24-bit field, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted string, a related issue to CVE-2014-7923.
